animeTitle: Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou: Hobo Mainichi ◯◯! Namappoi Douga (Dub)
otherNames: Almost Daily __! Sort of Live Video, Monster Musume WEB Shorts, 「モンスター娘のいる日常」ほぼ毎日○○！生っぽい動画
synopsis: Anime shorts that offer a secret candid look at the daily lives of Monster Musume. The shorts will update almost every weekday, but each short will be available for 24 hours only. The weekends will have a digest version summarizing the week's videos.
